displayProperties.name: A Challenge Awaits…
displayProperties.description:
Your current character has not yet completed this mission on Legendary difficulty.
Completing all Legendary missions provides additional rewards per class.

displayProperties.name: Legendary
displayProperties.description: Heavily shielded and highly aggressive combatants appear in great numbers.

displayProperties.name: Champion Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Air Superiority
displayProperties.description: Flying units do increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Rank-and-File Damage Increase
displayProperties.description: Rank-and-file combatants deal increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You may face combatants with [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, or [Void] Void Shields.

displayProperties.name: Champions: Mob
displayProperties.description: This mode contains additional Champions.

displayProperties.name: Hot Knife
displayProperties.description: Shanks now have Solar shields

displayProperties.name: Empath
displayProperties.description: Enhanced radar. Take increased damage from melee.

displayProperties.name: The Core Four
displayProperties.description: A challenge awaits…

displayProperties.name: Champion Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier and [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Of All Trades
displayProperties.description: A challenge awaits…

displayProperties.name: Torment of Taniks
displayProperties.description: Solar and environmental damage increased.

displayProperties.name: Limited Revives
displayProperties.description: Limited fireteam revives. Gain additional revives by defeating Champions.

displayProperties.name: Grask's Bile
displayProperties.description: Incoming environmental damage increased. Knockback damage and distance increased.

displayProperties.name: Torment of Fikrul
displayProperties.description: Arc and environmental damage increased.

displayProperties.name: Acute Arc Burn
displayProperties.description: +25% Arc damage dealt and +50% Arc damage received.

displayProperties.name: Grounded
displayProperties.description: Damage taken while you are airborne is greatly increased.

displayProperties.name: The Only Oracle For You
displayProperties.description: A challenge awaits…

displayProperties.name: Glass
displayProperties.description: Health and shields are reduced by half, but recovery is twice as fast.

displayProperties.name: Shocker
displayProperties.description: When defeated, Goblins spawn Arc pools that causes damage over time.

displayProperties.description:
Round 1: Hive
Round 2: Fallen
Final Round: Valus Ta'aurc

displayProperties.description:
You will face [Shield-Piercing] Barrier and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

You must equip Anti-Barrier and Anti-Unstoppable mods to your arms armor to defeat them. These mods come from the Seasonal Artifact.
